programme.desc: Get the Hump / Sing For Your Supper - It's Best to the rescue when Bester's phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep152
programme.desc: Big Sister Sam / Perfect Chemistry - Patrick's big sister Samantha comes for a visit. // Sandy and Plankton bond over their shared love.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep316
programme.desc: The Wurst Job / The Sound of Meddle - Ronnie Anne lands the internship of a lifetime with Bruno, but will she be able to hang? // Dreaming of DJ-ing at the Gatos halftime show, Carl goes undercover with Alexis and the school band!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sister Act / House Flip - To get out of doing things they don't like, Lana and Lola secretly switch places and pretend to be the other. // After causing Flip to get hurt, the kids sneak him into the attic to care for him without Mom and Dad knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Don't You Fore-get About Me / Tough Cookies - Hit by the realization that her big sister will be going off to college soon, Leni tries to thwart Lori's plans. // Lincoln and Clyde start their own cookie-making business, but realize it's a lot more work than they realized.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep3
programme.desc: Jellyfishing / Plankton - While Squidward recovers from a bicycle accident, SpongeBob and Patrick takes him jellyfishing. // SpongeBob falls victim to a scheme by the evil Plankton.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep161
programme.desc: Mooncation / Mr. Krabs Takes a Vacation - Sandy only wanted to spend a relaxing vacation alone on the moon. But it seems she's got a stowaway aboard her rocket who doesn't share her idea. // On his trip to the Ocean Mint, Mr. Krabs learns that old money is shredded and burned.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Dolores Moody / P.I.R.A.T.E. - Parker tries to cheer up the grouchiest woman on Mt. Middlemost-Dolores Moody. // Parker, Angus, and Russell must save the S.S. Steadfast from being taken by pirates.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Flock This Way / Movers and Fakers - Rosa's family activity of birdwatching in the woods goes sour when Sergio gets mistaken for a rare species. // Tired of not having a space of his own, Bobby secretly moves into a vacant apartment unit in the building. Feat. Lori Loud

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep112
programme.desc: Porous Pockets / Choir Boys - When SpongeBob suddenly becomes the richest citizen of Bikini Bottom, he finds himself surrounded by lots of new friends. // It's the day of Squidward's lead solo audition with the Bikini Bottom Men's Choir, and Squidward is brimming with excitement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep113
programme.desc: Krusty Krushers / The Card - Mr. Krabs hatches up another get-rich-quick scheme: professional wrestling! But Mr. Krabs isn't the one who's going to wrestle. // The new Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy trading cards are on sale, and Bob is determined to get the rare talking card.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep205
programme.desc: Whirlybrains / MermaidPants - SpongeBob and Patrick get hooked on the latest fad - flying your own brain like a tiny drone! // When SpongeBob & Patrick play Mermaidman and Barnacleboy, it's all fun and games until their sworn enemies arrive!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep206
programme.desc: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow - When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Sunday No FunDay - After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Fluttering Finger Mindslip - When Po learns a kung fu move that can erase someone's short-term memory, he takes it too far.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Rhino's Revenge - When a rhino comes to the Valley of Peace seeking to destroy the Dragon Warrior, Po tries to befriend him before he discovers Po's true identity.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Return to Omashu - The kids return to Omashu so that Aang can learn Earthbending from King Bumi. But when they get there, they are shocked to find the city is now in Fire Nation hands. Despite the danger, Aang enters Omashu in search of King Bumi.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Misfortune Cookie - When Rico gets a freaky fortune from his cookie, he initially ignores it. Julien sets out to make Rico's fortune come true.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Otter Gone Wild / Cat's Cradle - When the penguins bring Marlene with them on a sno-cone mission in the park, she can't handle the freedom of being outside the zoo walls. // Max the cat is on the run from evil animal control Officer X, and he comes to the penguins for help.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Misfortune Cookie / Monkey Love - When Rico gets a freaky fortune from his cookie, he initially ignores it. Julien sets out to make Rico's fortune come true. // A female chimp named Lulu arrives at the zoo for a short stay, and Phil is smitten. Unfortunately, Lulu falls for Mason.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stank Breath / Frog Day Afternoon - Buhdeuce has to deal with some awesomely bad stank breath that leads to some awesomely bad trouble. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce teach their pet Jelly how to fetch, and she accidentally fetches a monster egg.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dorg Goes to Adventure Club / Dorg Wants a Scare - When Dorg accidentally shrinks his sister's Adventure Club sash, he must replace the badges. // Dorg wants a good scare, so Patronella fills his house with all the gang's secret fears. Dorg finds out he's more scare-able than he thought!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Bumblebee Magnetic Karaoke Hippo / Time Out - Felicity helps a mashup creature to realize his true potential. // To avoid a visit to Dr. Lotzashots, Felicity borrows Father Time's watch.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Laked Nake / Doom Baby - The dudes' decision to babysit Richard Dickson might cost Craig his life. // A good day at the lake goes bad when Sanjay loses his bathing suit.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Release the Hound / Cube is the Loneliest Number - Bernie pleads with Ollie and Cleo to let him keep a gross doglike monster they are intending to pack. // When Ashlor traps Ollie, Bernie, Cleo and Wowski, Ollie figures out how to escape to the Dark Cube.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep105
programme.desc: I, Fanbot / Berry Sick - Desperate not to fail a test, Fanboy decides to switch brains with a robot. // During a summer heat wave, the boys discover the Frosty Freeze machine is on the fritz.

programme.title: The Australian Wars Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Northern Australia was the final frontier of conquest, and though The Australian Wars began with the British Government it was concluded by the founding fathers of modern Australia..

programme.title: Australian Story Ep2
programme.desc: Leigh Sales presents extraordinary stories of real people. In 2023 we go behind the scenes with actor Claudia Karvan, hear changemaker Saul Griffith's clean energy vision, and dive in with underwater filmmaker Valerie Taylor.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep29
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep49
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The Drum Ep34
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging thoughtful and challenging debate with a diverse panel. Presented by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep49
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep36
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep49
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. Our network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: The Business Ep24
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep49
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Champion Paralympian Kurt Fearnley finds a heart of gold shining brightly amongst the townsfolk of Tennant Creek. Locals are overcoming intergenerational trauma by nourishing residents with great education, art and religion.

programme.title: The World Ep49
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep2

programme.desc: Dirty Copper - The Dark Side of the Energy Transition. The transition to green energy is crucial for the future health of the planet. But it requires vast amounts of copper. The growth in electric cars and renewable technologies in particular demand high volumes of the metal - which is often mined in South America, at a huge cost to the environment.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Muniz vs Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - The wide open light heavyweight division will see a new top contender emerge on February 26 when elite finishers Muniz and Spanncollide in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. Coming off back-to-back first round wins over Ion Cutelaba and Dominick Reyes, Texas’ Spann is in top form heading into his meeting with Krylov, who will look to improve on his stellar 93 percent finishing rate after 2022 wins against Alexander Gustafsson and Volkan Oezdemir propelled him into the Top 10

programme.title: Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The event was first held in 1987 at the Jarama circuit in Spain. The reason for this was because the main Portuguese circuit at the time, the Circuito do Estoril, was not yet ready to be used for motorcycle racing. However, Portugal still wanted to host a round in the championship that year, and so opted to use the Jarama circuit until their own was ready for use. In 1988, a second race was held at the new Jerez circuit which was also located in Spain.[1] The original plan was to host the race in Portugal at the Estoril circuit, but Jerez was chosen instead. The race was also named 'EXPO '92', referring to the expo of a similar name held at the Spanish city of Seville that year. This makes Portugal the only country to host multiple grands prix under Portuguese flag and name, despite the locations of the venues not being located in the country itself.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2252
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Main Event - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.
